Title: An Act Converting the Sta. Maria Barangay High School in the Municipality of Potia, Province of Ifugao, into a National High School to be Known as the Sta. Maria National High School
Data:
BATAS PAMBANSA Blg. 529
An Act Converting the Sta. Maria Barangay High School in the Municipality of Potia, Province of Ifugao, into a National High School to be Known as the Sta. Maria National High School
Section 1. The Sta. Maria Barangay High School in the Municipality of Potia, Province of Ifugao, is hereby converted into a national high school to be known as the Sta. Maria National High School.
Section 2. The operation of said school for the current fiscal year shall continue to be funded out of local funds and from its share of national aid to local schools. The requirements for succeeding fiscal years shall be provided in the forthcoming General Appropriations Acts.
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.1Ã¢wphi1
